name: AURION
description:
AURION: Architected for Digital Certainty

AURION (AURI) is a value-preservation protocol on Solana, engineered with a focus on "Anti-fragility." We have deprecated the standard inflationary staking model in favor of mathematically guaranteed price backing.

The Foundation: Concrete Floor Thesis
Unlike traditional AMMs where liquidity is spread thin, AURION utilizes Concentrated Liquidity (CLMM) via Orca Whirlpools to create a rigid foundation.
100% Backed: Every circulating token is covered by USDC reserves.
Hard Buy Wall: The entire backing capital is deployed in a single, massive Bid order immediately below the current price. This creates a physical price floor that acts as a hard stop against downside volatility.

On-Chain Proof
Solvency isn’t a promise—it’s an on-chain invariant. The smart contract mathematically ensures there is always enough USDC in the pool to honor the floor price.

Growth Mechanic: The Dynamic Ratchet
The protocol operates on an "Appreciation over Yield" doctrine.

There is no staking and no inflation.

Instead, protocol revenue is captured and used to mechanically raise the "Concrete Floor".

The Dynamic Ratchet allows the floor to move only in one direction: up. As the protocol grows, your downside protection rises with it.

Zero Trust & Security
We removed the human element to eliminate rug-pull risks:

Zero Token Allocation: The development team holds 0 AURI. There is no "dev bag" to dump on the market.

Mint Renounced: The keys to create new tokens were burned at genesis. Supply is strictly fixed.

Manipulation Resistant: Integrated TWAP oracles protect the protocol against flash loan attacks and instantaneous price manipulation.

AURION is not a price peg — it is a price guarantee enforced by code.
